sentence.Network_en: The ship would lie there mirrored in a perfectly unmoving glossy sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 船会停靠在那里，映衬在一片波澜不兴的湛蓝海水之中。

sentence.Network_en: David said nothing, but simply nodded, as if understanding perfectly.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴维什么都没说,只是点点头,好像完全理解了.

sentence.Network_en: This adaptation perfectly captures the spirit of Kurt Vonnegut's novel.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次改编非常好地抓住了库尔特·冯内古特小说的精髓。

entry.tran: 完全地，十足地（尤用于所说的话可能会受质疑时）
entry.def: You can use perfectly to emphasize an adjective or adverb, especially when you think the person you are talking to might doubt what you are saying.

example.ex: There's no reason why you can't have a perfectly normal child...
example.tran: 你没有理由不能拥有一个完全正常的孩子。

example.ex: They made it perfectly clear that it was pointless to go on...
example.tran: 他们非常明确地表示继续下去毫无意义。

entry.def: If something is done perfectly, it is done so well that it could not possibly be done better.

example.ex: This adaptation perfectly captures the spirit of Kurt Vonnegut's novel...
example.tran: 这次改编非常好地抓住了库尔特·冯内古特小说的精髓。

entry.def: If you describe something as perfectly good or acceptable, you are emphasizing that there is no reason to use or get something else, although other people may disagree.

example.ex: You can buy perfectly good instruments for a lot less.
example.tran: 你可以少花一大笔钱买到顶好的仪器。

means.word_mean: 1. completely and without qualification; used informally as intensifiers;

sentences.sentence: "you can be dead sure of my innocence"

means.word_mean: 2. in a perfect or faultless way;

sentences.sentence: "She performed perfectly on the balance beam"

auth_sentence.content: Salmon Well I think it's certainly perfectly possible.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Salmon Well I think it's certainly perfectly possible.

auth_sentence.content: Never had their pop sensibilities been so perfectly honed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Never had their pop sensibilities been so perfectly honed.

auth_sentence.content: Perfectly proper that that document should not be published.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perfectly proper that that document should not be published.

Sentence.sentence: Major supermarkets, in meeting consumer expectations, will often reject entire crops of perfectly edible fruit and vegetables at the farm because they do not meet exacting marketing standards for their physical characteristics, such as size and appearance.
Perfectly eatable fruit and vegetable crops often fail to reach supermarkets due to their size or physical appearance
Finally, he had a speech that was interesting and perfectly understandable to his audience.

sentences.en: It is perfectly legal to charge extra for these services.
sentences.cn: 这些服务收取额外费用完全合法。

sentences.en: I’m perfectly able to look after myself,for your information.
sentences.cn: 我完全能够照顾自己,特此奉告。

sentences.en: In the state I was in, this seemed a perfectly sensible remark.
sentences.cn: 在我所处的情况下，这么说看来是完全合乎情理的。

sentences.en: It started out as a perfectly normal day.
sentences.cn: 这一天开始时跟平常没什么两样。

sentences.en: You know full well that smoking is forbidden in this room.
sentences.cn: 你很清楚这个房间里禁止吸烟。

sentences.en: You know perfectly well what I am referring to.
sentences.cn: 你非常清楚我指的是什么。
